 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹ֫פֶן‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==hollow of hand== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺפֶן‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חָפְנִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּפְנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhNQAWAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAA1ABYAAAJ3jI8Bye3/VgIUWlYvlabya2Wa2JFgs33QNqlny4Jx+a7pOddybrso33sBVSmTLoiYFW8w344oIvGWR4VJGZVKmLWpdsnJOnufHDWbhB68LHC6FMauY1wr+E6d4/dlPr/pV6QHtyCY9xNoZlTF2NL4GAEpOUmZUAAAOw==">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhMwAUAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAzABQAAAJ6jI+py+0PozSggmlzpXeeTDnayJHQuClgYpVXG5kqzHZpQEsrssf5g+q4PD8hD4W7BU/K3IoGCxpnz1tSCE1VjVaT9fpp2kDkH5iRFYelZvN6je0iz/DwMa51X+O1vHjsN/UmIocH9/J1J3g45EGYqFjiCKQ3aXnJUAAAOw=="> — also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhKwAVAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAArABUAAAJjjI+py33gYgN00SsTZHfrnhmdh4DlOFWPSJ6WecKB17L1+mKuGk/z7dCFHhCgb4gMJoe8ZRDYJBolUdynypwqKjxUSkhlScGf32tLHjdHa9PGG4Oz5/R6fRtXoWh3p/8P6FAAADs="> ***hollow in the ground***; and, acc, to [[BDB#Zehnpf|Zehnpf]]<sup>BAB i, 635</sup>, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—upunnu***</u></abbr>, ***bowl***, but <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—***</u></abbr> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">?) — only dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפְנַיִם‎</span> [[Eccl.4.6|Eccl 4:6]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפְנֵי‎</span> [[Ezek.10.7|Ezek 10:7]] (strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]] internal grounds); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפְנֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ezek.10.2|Ezek 10:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפְנָיו‎</span> [[Lev.16.2|Lev 16:2]]; [[Prov.30.4|Prov 30:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפְנֵינֶם‎</span> [[Exod.9.8|Exod 9:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלֵּא ה‎</span> [[Ezek.10.2|Ezek 10:2]] + v[[Ezek.10.7|Ezek 10:7]] (strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]] compare above); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹא ח‎</span> = ***handful*** [[Exod.9.8|Exod 9:8]]; [[Lev.16.12|Lev 16:12]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Eccl.4.6|Eccl 4:6]], material follows in implicit accusative; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מיאֿסף רוח בח‎</span> [[Prov.30.4|Prov 30:4]].
